description:
*Note this is the Portable version of MonoGame for use in development with class library solutions. A platform will be required to run your solution with the appropriate version of MonoGame for that platform.

MonoGame is an open source implementation of the Microsoft XNA 4.x Framework.
      The goal is to make it easy for XNA developers to create cross-platform games with extremely high code reuse. We currently support iOS, Android, Windows (both OpenGL and DirectX), Mac OS X, Linux, Windows 8 Store, Windows Phone 8, PlayStation Mobile, and the OUYA console.

This is a community project and not directly delivered from the MonoGame team
releaseNotes:
Updated in line with Full 3.2 release - April 13th 2014

Log issues and questions on the GitHub for for Portable Monogame
https://github.com/DDReaper/MonoGame/tree/develop.portable
summary: MonoGame Portable is a PCL supported version of the open source cross platform implementation of Microsoft's XNA 4.x Framework
title: MonoGame Portable
